ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Kindly Ones" part 1! At last it has come--a conflagration of nightmarish proportions that will affect the future of the Endless and the fate of the Dreaming forever! Friends, foes and unexpected betrayers return in the last major story arc of THE SANDMAN!
This story presents the beginning of the longest, and the most pivotal Sandman-story arc.
The future of the Endless and the fate of the Dreaming will be affected by a nightmarish conflict. A surprising ending awaits.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-08-06 16:33:18. [CVDB38608]

ComicInfo.Title: The Kindly Ones, Part 1
